pr_title: [ML] Pass through the stop-on-warn setting for categorization jobs

timeline.message:
[ML] Pass through the stop-on-warn setting for categorization jobs

When per_parition_categorization.stop_on_warn is set for an analysis
config it is now passed through to the autodetect C++ process.

Also adds some end-to-end tests that exercise the functionality
added in elastic/ml-cpp#1356

timeline.bodyText: There's no point deleting the data index or refreshing here, as all indices are cleaned up between tests by the base class
timeline.author: droberts195

timeline.message: Don't mix string builder with string concatenation
